sub_title: Internet Consultant | Digital Marketing | SEO & Social Media Coach | WordPress Expert at Globally Cool
summary:
How great would it be to harness the full potential of the internet for your benefit? Imagine people from all corners of the globe discovering your products or services online, even if they were previously unaware of your existence.

I am an Internet Consultant & WordPress Developer at Globally Cool, specializing in Search Engine Optimization and Digital Marketing. Since 2003, my mission has been to assist business owners in expanding their international reach by effectively promoting their companies, services, and products on the web.

My true passion lies in sharing the knowledge I have accumulated throughout the years, enabling you to leverage it to grow your business and attract more customers using the power of the internet.

Furthermore, my educational background in Technical Information Science and Higher Information Science equips me to offer a wide array of value-added services. Moreover, it has empowered me with the ability to discuss technical matters without resorting to jargon, ensuring clear and concise communication.

Areas of expertise include:
- SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
- Digital Marketing
- Social Media Marketing
- PHP
- MySQL
- WordPress
- Toolset, Types & Views
- WPML (WordPress Multilingual)
- Elegant Themes Divi & Extra Themes

During my leisure time, I relish the moments spent with my family. Whether we're joyfully bouncing on the trampoline with my daughter or competing against each other in thrilling Mario Kart races, these activities bring us closer together. Additionally, I find solace and inspiration while riding my motorcycle, appreciating the breathtaking beauty of sunsets on the horizon.

If you seek assistance in enhancing your online presence, look no further. At Globally Cool (https://globallycool.nl), we boast a team of enthusiastic experts ready to propel your international business to new heights!

treasury_media.title: WordPress.org | OpenSource CMS
treasury_media.description:
My preferred CMS / development platform.

WordPress started as just a blogging system, but has evolved to be used as full content management system and so much more through the thousands of plugins and widgets and themes, WordPress is limited only by your imagination. (And tech chops.)

WordPress is web software you can use to create a beautiful website, blog, or app. We like to say that WordPress is both free and priceless at the same time.
More information: http://bit.ly/wp-org

treasury_media.title: Elegant Themes | Divi
treasury_media.description:
My preferred WordPress Parent Theme. Divi is a great Theme for using as a Parent for a Child Theme configuration. Out-of-the-box it offers a wide range of building blocks to set-up a website in no-time. Divi is a great choice when building Corporate sites combined with a blog. 
More information on Divi: http://bit.ly/et-divi-theme

treasury_media.title: Toolset | Custom types made simple
treasury_media.description:
One of my most used plugin sets: Toolset! This is a collection of many WordPress Plugins, but for sure my most favorites will be:
Types, for creating custom post types, taxonomy and fields.
Views, for creating custom templates. and create database views
CRED. for adding front-end post adding / editing to any site.
Maps, for creating custom Google Maps with Post info plotted on the maps. 
More info: http://bit.ly/toolset-types-views

treasury_media.title: Elegant Themes | Extra
treasury_media.description:
My preferred WordPress Parent Theme when building an online Magazine Style website / blog. It uses the same engine as Divi, the so-called Divi-Builder. Extra is a great Theme for using as a Parent for a Child Theme configuration.  Extra is a great choice when building Magazine styles website. Out-of-the-box it offers a pretty good look-and-feel combined with the WooCommerce / E-commerce Plugin. 
More information on Divi: http://bit.ly/et-extra-theme

projects.title: West Africa Connect | Matchmaking Event
projects.description:
West Africa Connect is a matchmaking event organised in West Africa.

This outstanding event will bring together suppliers and service providers from 16 West African countries and carefully chosen regional and international buyers from all around the world. 

Supplier countries: Benin, Burkina Faso, Cabo Verde, Ivory Coast, Gambia, Ghana, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Liberia, Mali, Mauritania, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal, Sierra Leone and Togo with buyers all around the world. 

Due to Covid-19 this event has been organised in 2021 as an online matchmaking event. In 2022 the second event has been organised as a hybrid event, where the physical event took place in Ghana.

projects.title: Metaalunie Academie | Social Media in de Metaal
projects.description:
Training Metaalunie members at the bi-monthly course: "Social Media in de Metaal voor beginners" and "Social Media in de Metaal voor (semi-) gevorderden" (Using Social Media for online marketing purposes in the Metal Sector).

This course discusses good practices and gives the participant tips and checklists in subjects like:
LinkedIn Personal Profiles
LinkedIn Company Pages
Inbound Marketing
Twitter for Businesses
Facebook company Pages
Measuring and Management

projects.description:
Development of the Export Promotion / Market Information Portal for GEPA.

profile_positions.description:
As an Internet Consultant & WordPress Developer at Globally Cool, I am training entrepreneurs on the topic of Search Engine Optimisation / Digital Marketing.

“INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS MADE EASY”.
Since 1995 at Globally Cool we have trained and coached thousands of professionals, in over 50 emerging markets. We work for reputed international organisations such as ITC/United Nations, UNIDO/United Nations, CBI/Ministry of Foreign Affairs, World Trade Centre, GIZ/Germany, Frisian Province, Fairtrade and private organisations. Check out our clients and join us!

We train, coach and advise managers and staff of companies, associations, chambers of commerce and trade promotion and destination marketing organisations to achieve sustainable export success.

CONSULT
Market Intelligence
Strategy Development
Branding and Promotion
Digital Marketing

COACH
Capacity Building
Globally Cool Academy

CONNECT
Trade Intelligence Portals
Trade Fairs and Missions
Business Matching
profile_positions.title: Internet Consultant & WordPress Developer

profile_positions.description:
Facts Figures Future (FFF) specializes in trade development for developing countries. We have conducted several thousands of EU market research and consultancy projects and have trained thousands of SMEs and trade promotion organizations in and from a wide range of developing countries. Our sector expertise lies in sectors such as food, non-food, services and industrial. 

Excellent track record with governments and NGO's such as CBI, Belgian Development Agency, Swedish Chambers/SEDA, Fairtrade and Flowercouncil of Holland. Recently started to work for NL EVD International / Matchmaking Facility and Finnpartnership. 

Our service is characterised by commitment, personal attention, quality and a long term business relationship.

profile_positions.description: Initially this internship started at KPM Mobile, however this department was taken over by Atos Origin. volunteer_experiences.description: Since September 2020 I'm a member of the participation council (MR / medezeggenschapsraad) of the public primary school it Pompeblêd, De Westereen. Giving advice in The council provides advice on board and education-related matters.

Since 2021 I'm a member of neighbourhood association "De Sudereen" at De Westereen. February 2021 I volunteered for the role of secretary. In this role I'm responsible for the communication and membership administration.

company.name: Project Fan stien nei grien - mfa De Hege Seis

volunteer_experiences.description:
The Multifunctional Accommodation (mfa) De Hege Seis houses the De Brede School Foundation, the North Fryslân Library and Peuterhonk Childcare Center (Kids First). 

The "Fan stien nei grien" project raises money to transform the squares around the two primary schools, the public library and childcare, into public green spaces for activities and learning. The squares have the function of a schoolyard, but outside school hours they give the villagers a place to meet each other in a green and natural environment.

My role in this project is fundraising and developing & maintaining the mfa-dehegeseis.frl website.
